price: Nuko nyuma y’ibyo, turabababarira kugira ngo mushimire.
arabic: ثُمَّ عَفَوۡنَا عَنكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma ʿafawnā ʿankum min baʿdi dhālika laʿallakum tashkurūna
